attributes.action: I want you to change the employment payment procedure,for exp weekly or monthly
attributes.additional_details: I want you to do it because family needs can be arranged easier, money can be used easier or paid back easier, the wait for every month is a struggle and some people can’t manage for a month.
attributes.background: I want you to change it because each time I am struggling where as when I was working weekly it was easier for me to budget my money, paying rent was easier and I had easier control on my money.

rejection.details:
We're sorry to hear about your situation, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

It's up to employers how frequently they pay their staff. We can accept petitions about the frequency of Government payments, such as benefits, but you'd need to be clear what payment you wanted to see paid differently.
